Input-field

An input field allows the user to enter information in your application; for example an email address or a password.

Installation 

                  
                    npm i @govflanders/vl-ui-input-field

or 

                  
                    yarn add @govflanders/vl-ui-input-field

Usage

Import SASS 

                  
                  @import "vl-ui-input-field/src/scss/input-field";

Make sure your sass --include-path includes node_modules/@govflanders/.

Input-field

Appearance of a basic input-field.

      <label class="vl-form__label" for="input-field-1">Naam</label>
  <input class="vl-input-field"
    type="text"
    id="input-field-1"
    name="input-field-1"
    value=""/>

Input-field block

Stretches the input-field to the width of the parent.

      <label class="vl-form__label" for="input-field-2">Naam</label>
  <input class="vl-input-field vl-input-field--block"
    type="text"
    id="input-field-2"
    name="input-field-2"
    value=""/>

Input-field error

The input field displays a red border and accepts an extra form error element underneath the input field.

Veld naam is verplicht

      <label class="vl-form__label" for="input-field-3">Naam</label>
  <input class="vl-input-field vl-input-field--error"
    type="text"
    id="input-field-3"
    name="input-field-3"
    value=""aria-describedby="input-field-3-error"/>
    <p class="vl-form__error" id="input-field-3-error">Veld naam is verplicht</p>

Input-field disabled

Disable the input-field if a user is not allowed to make changes. Add the [disabled] attribute to disable user interaction.

      <label class="vl-form__label" for="input-field-4">Naam</label>
  <input class="vl-input-field vl-input-field--disabled"
    type="text"
    id="input-field-4"
    name="input-field-4"
    value=""disabled/>

Input field small

Small variant of an input-field. Can be displayed with or without a label.

      <label class="vl-form__label" for="input-field-5">Naam</label>
  <input class="vl-input-field vl-input-field--small"
    type="text"
    id="input-field-5"
    name="input-field-5"
    value=""/>

Input field search

The search field shows a submit button when the input-field receives focus.

      <label class="vl-u-visually-hidden" for="input-field-6">Zoeken</label>
  <div class="vl-input-field--inline">
    <input class="vl-input-field vl-input-field__input"
      type="search"
      id="input-field-6"
      name="input-field-6"
      value=""
      placeholder="Zoeken" />
    <button class="vl-input-field__submit vl-button" type="submit">
      <i class="vl-vi vl-vi-magnifier" aria-hidden="true"></i>
      <span class="vl-u-visually-hidden">Zoeken</span>
    </button>
  </div>
